issue.title: [CI][GLib] Set timeout to Homebrew
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3948](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3948). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can't get Homebrew log when Travis detects hanged Homebrew process and kill the CI job.
We need to detect hanged Homebrew process and kill the Homebrew process to get Homebrew log.
